content: bees, Aristotle says they can’t learn because they can’t hear
metaphysics associates sight w/ knowledge (eg. Aristotle)
via Aristotle, sight is privileged sense re: knowledge, knowing for sake of knowing linked to sight as senseless sensation (sight privileged even when no praxis in view)
via Aristotle, knowledge as knowing to learn and to teach
Derrida [in preparation for this Cornell address] felt like a cornered animal, while worrying he would be like Elijah, an eschatological harbinger
for Aristotle, human distinguished from animals who have hard, dry eyes (tōn sklerophtalmōn), who alway see
Derrida wants to cultivate a new university Enlightenment, but also insists University must not be a scleropthalmic animal [must go dark, blink]
un ubiquiste, a “ubiquitist,” “professor au large,” back from sea
Leibniz’s 2 principles of reason: 1) principle of non-contradition 2) principle of rendering reason: for any true proposition, reason can be rendered (Omnis veritatis reddi ratio potest)
“must be rendered”: principle of reason as duty, debt, law, command, imperative

in French, Leibniz’s reddere rationem is rendre raison de quelque chose, does that mean reason is owed? it gives rise to circulation? [from ratio of principium reddendae rationis to reason as faculty]

(137) one of Heidegger’s most insistent questions: how did the incubation of reason [starting w/ Aristotle’s “roots,” “principles,” “causes”] take until the 17<sup><small>th</small></sup> Century to become the “principle of reason”?
who is more faithful to reason’s call? who has a “keener ear”? the one who questions it, or the one who doesn’t want to hear any questions about it
for Heidegger, principle of reason accompanied by interpretation of essence of beings as objects, an object present as representation (Vorstellung)
abyss, hole, Abgrund, empty “gorge”: impossibility for a principle of grounding (reason) to ground itself
is the reason for reason rational? (Pierce says you can’t demand a reason for reason)
Derrida proposes an other resistance, that of the remainder, thus a restanalysis

the poleros (politics, polemos, eros, seduction) of analysis, ends in an abyss, where resistance to psychoanalytic Lösung, in the name of truth, can only be a disavowal > to analyze, to say to other: prefer, take, love my solution, you will be in truth if you do not resist my solution

the re- of repraesentatio renders reasonable a presence encountered by the rendering present, to the subject of representation, the knowing self: when, essence of beings is objects, and object present is a representation to a subject
principle of reason (Satz vom Grund) tells us to protect [dominant] relation of ob-ject before a subject that says “I”, and is assured of presence [skleropthalmic]

content: Heidegger makes language do its work [re: interaction btwn begegnen, entgegen, Gegenstand and Stellen, Vorstellen, Zustellen]
vis-à-vis Heidegger, one can no longer distinguish btwn technology, science, theory and rationality, principle of reason cannot be separated from idea of technology [techno-science]
(143) never before has science been tied so closely to military aims, military technology [Derrida refers to finalisation of research]

philosophy department no longer unavailable to utilitarian purposes as Kant envisioned > today, via military budget [?], what is produced by philosophy can always be used > if even to keep the masters busy: ideological bonus of luxury for society that can afford it
literature and poetry can be used in ideological warfare as much as linguistics, rhetoric
“information ensures the insurance of calculation and the calculation of assurance,” [apparently, according to Heidegger, Leibniz was the inventor of life insurance]
in-formation does not just offer content, it gives form: “in-formiert”

information most economic, clearest, fastest, instructs men about safeguarding (Sicherstellung) their needs, ta khreai > computers, data banks, constructed on basis of this calculable language: all this, via Heidegger, assures man’s mastery over earth [Derrida can’t elaborate on this point]

content: Derrida’s topic: reawaken responsibility, in university or in face of university, by heeding other demands of the principle of reason
irrationalism, nihilism, posture completely symmetrical to, thus dependent on principle of reason [Leibniz denounced extravagance of irrationalism]
this is observed when those who defend principle of reason act w/out reason, w/ obscurantism and nihilism to defend reason
reason only one species of thought
“orientation” is not bad in itself

[re: CIPH] new responsibility of community of thought w/out secured frontier btwn basic & end-oriented research (entre recherche fondamentale et recherche finalisée) > rethink community, institution, and all ruses, tâche infinie, de la raison finalisante > paths by which apparently disinterested research can by reinvested by all sorts of programs

social sciences steeped in Marxist, Weberian, neo-Weberian methodology, they are controlled by the spaces they claim to analyze——same goes for Marx and Freud, en tant qu’ils sont normés par un projet de pratique scientifique et par le principe de raison > even when claiming to be revolutionary, they don’t trouble the “most conservative forces of a University”

theoretico-political hierarchy w/ philosopher at top found in Kant, Schelling, Nietzsche, Heidegger, and in Aristotle’s Metaphysics > all agree that essential feature of academic responsibility must not be professional education

strategic rhythm of new [professorial?] responsibility: multiple sites (lieux), rhythm of blinking eye (d’un battement de paupières), play one risk off other, la clôture contre l’abîme, l’abîme contre la clôture [hard eye (of reason) has no rhythm, no heart beat, no arrêt of sur-vie]
according to Kant, the core/heart of the University is in the philosophy department
[re: desiring to remove the university] anarchy risks reproducing hierarchy
acc. Aristotle, math developed in Egypt due to leisure time enjoyed by priestly caste
(152-53) for Aristotle, theoretician leader possessing logos knows how to teach, how to lead, how to command
for Aristotle, theoretical thinker is above manual laborer, who acts w/out knowing, like fire burns
invagination of internal pocket: empty place for chance (for great and precious freedom of play) [re: time of reflection on university]

“thinking” requires both principle of reason and what’s beyond it, both archē and an-archy > decision [of thought] always risks the worst, to claim to erase the risk by institutional program is to create a barricade against a future
reflect on reflection, seize inaudible in sort of poetic telephony, “hear” hearing > this time of reflection is heterogeneous to what it reflects, gives time, chance of event

protocols of vigilance for new Aufklärung: beware the abysses and gorges, but also the bridges & barriers, beware of opening university to bottomless outside or closing it in on itself so that it is available to any interest, or becomes useless > beware of ends, university w/out ends?

time for reflection [on university?], invagination of internal pocket, the chance for this event, chance of an instant, Augenblick, a wink, a blink [a beat, no longer hard eyes, see that what makes see is letting oneself stop seeing]

(155) can one keep chance? can one keep both memory & chance? je suis plutôt tenté de penser que l’une ne se garde pas sans l’autre, sans garder l’autre et sans garder de l’autre [double guard of university]
